author: KATE FELDMAN
title: SEE IT: Justin Timberlake quotes NSYNC in Bai Super Bowl ad
text:
NEW YORK DAILY NEWS  38 PM 
Justin Timberlake and Christopher Walken made the $5 million Super Bowl commercial price tag well worth the bill. 
The two actors were stoic superstars in an ad for the drink company, but the script told a different story as the gentlemen recited the lyrics to NSYNC‚Äôs ‚ÄúBye Bye Bye.‚Äù Christopher Walken and Justin Timberlake starred in a Super Bowl ad for Bai. (Bai via YouTube) 
Timberlake teased the spot before the big game, asking Twitter ‚Äúwhat are you doing this weekend?‚Äù 
But no one expected Walken‚Äôs stone-faced special appearance ‚Äî or the cheesy pop song. Bye Bye = Bai Bai üòÇ #SB51
